subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
China: U.S. trade ties are 'politicized'

05/24/07 11:24 PM, EDT
Chinese state media said on Friday that U.S. relations with Beijing were being used as a "political football" between Democrats and Republicans who have an eye on next year's presidential election.
